scripts.build: npm run build:rust && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:rust: cd rust && cargo build --release && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir ../pkg
scripts.test: npm run test:ts && npm run test:rust
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:rust
scripts.format: npm run format:ts && npm run format:rust
scripts.run:oxigraph: (command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1 && (docker ps | grep -q oxigraph-server || docker run -d -p 7878:7878 --name oxigraph-server oxigraph/oxigraph) && sleep 3) || echo 'Docker not available, assuming Oxigraph server is running'; npx ts-node examples/basic-usage.ts --oxigraph
scripts.run:jena: (command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1 && (docker ps | grep -q jena-server || docker run -d -p 3030:3030 --platform linux/amd64 -v $(pwd)/fuseki-config:/fuseki/configuration -v $(pwd)/fuseki-config/shiro.ini:/fuseki/shiro.ini --name jena-server stain/jena-fuseki) && sleep 3) || echo 'Docker not available, assuming Jena Fuseki server is running'; JENA_DATASET="ds" npx ts-node examples/basic-usage.ts --jena
scripts.run:advanced: (command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1 && (docker ps | grep -q oxigraph-server || docker run -d -p 7878:7878 --name oxigraph-server oxigraph/oxigraph) && sleep 3) || echo 'Docker not available, assuming Oxigraph server is running'; npx ts-node examples/basic-usage.ts --advanced
scripts.run:all: (command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1 && ((docker ps | grep -q oxigraph-server || docker run -d -p 7878:7878 --name oxigraph-server oxigraph/oxigraph) && (docker ps | grep -q jena-server || docker run -d -p 3030:3030 --platform linux/amd64 -v $(pwd)/fuseki-config:/fuseki/configuration -v $(pwd)/fuseki-config/shiro.ini:/fuseki/shiro.ini --name jena-server stain/jena-fuseki) && sleep 3)) || echo 'Docker not available, assuming servers are running'; JENA_DATASET="ds" npx ts-node examples/basic-usage.ts
